text.section: A system of arbitration may provide that the decision of the arbiter is subject to review by an administrative law judge.

Notwithstanding the provisions in subsection (1) of this section, no agreement shall be recognized as valid and binding that diminishes the rights of any of the parties under this chapter. Also, no agreement shall be valid and binding unless it is agreed to by the employer's insurance carrier.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1813, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 4, sec. 16, effective April 4, 1994.
